verses.text:
I \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* with my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; with my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* did I make my \w supplication|strong="H2603"\w*.  +  r 142.1  t Maschil…: or, A Psalm of David, giving instruction *
I poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w complaint|strong="H7879"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him; I \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him my \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.

When my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* was \w overwhelmed|strong="H5848"\w* within me, then thou \w knewest|strong="H3045"\w* my \w path|strong="H5410"\w*. In the \w way|strong="H0734"\w* \w wherein|strong="H2098"\w* I \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* have they privily \w laid|strong="H2934"\w* a \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* for me.

I \w looked|strong="H5027"\w* on \add my\add* right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w*, but \add there was\add* no man that would \w know|strong="H5234"\w* me: \w refuge|strong="H4498"\w* \w failed|strong="H0006"\w* me; no man \w cared|strong="H1875"\w* for my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 142.4 \ft I looked…: or, Look on the right hand, and see\f*\f + \fr 142.4 \ft failed…: Heb. perished from me\f*\f + \fr 142.4 \ft cared…: Heb. sought after\f*

I \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou \add art\add* my \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* \add and\add* my \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.

\w Attend|strong="H7181"\w* unto my \w cry|strong="H7440"\w*; for I am \w brought|strong="H1809"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w low|strong="H1809"\w*: \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me from my \w persecutors|strong="H7291"\w*; for they are \w stronger|strong="H0553"\w* than I.

\w Bring|strong="H3318"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* out of \w prison|strong="H4525"\w*, that I may \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall compass me \w about|strong="H3803"\w*; for thou shalt deal \w bountifully|strong="H1580"\w* with me.
